mean_en: a group of numbers and letters that is used especially in the United Kingdom and Australia as part of an address to identify a mail delivery area
word_etyma: post 邮件，邮政 + code 编码→ postcode （英）邮政编码
short_phrase: postcode and stamp on the envelope
sentence: Don't forget to write down the postcode before sending the letter!
sentence_trans: 在寄信前别忘了填邮政编码！
